Posts.Content: I just started taking Arimidex and I am getting headaches and I am having really bad heart burn and lots of gas pain. I called the pharmacy and they told me these were normal.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: On Apr 29, 2012 1:15 AM AlliBK wrote: Sorry I mean no disrespect but are you kidding? It might come back but not as bad? That's like saying you're a little pregnant but not sure... If the cancer comes back he has no way in predicting how bad or what stage even.  The thing is we don't know that Armidex does avoid cancer at all costs. Women who take the drug faithfully still develop METS.  In fact many  die  who develop  a recurrence .I could give you several examples of this very issue of women I have known who have recently died from METS. who took not only Arimidex but the others in hoping it would work its magic instead of crippling pain. By the way I had stage 1 uterus cancer needed no treatment by a hysterectomy and my breast cancer was a 2.1 mm very small had lumpectomy and radiation and my doctors tell me I am going to be fine. Yes I am depressed and hope it never comes back and i am on armidex and if it comes back it will be treated again. If you have not good things to say and scare people dont write on here and dont tell women if it comes back they will die everyones situation is different!!! You are stupid!!!
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

The person who wrote that if it comes dies is a horrible thing to post on here there are many women if it comes back are treated
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Are these cancer my doctor wants my friend to do a stero biopsy?
Posts.Title: Cluster of calcifications

Posts.Content: Hope all turns off good!
Posts.Title: One year later

Posts.Content: I am on arimidex! My Brca came back negative as well!
Posts.Title: One year later

Posts.Content: Since I had uterus cancer and breast cancer its almost a year. My doctors tell me its gone and they don't think it will return! All was caught very early. Uterus I needed a total hysterectomy and Breast it was a 2.1mm had a lumpectomy and some radiation no big deal! The problem is I cant get cancer off my mind!! I now have to go for my first mammo since it all began! I still have to go for the colon test which I never had yet. The tests itself dont scare me its the results. I now think every test I have will turn out to be cancer!!! I know bad attitude!! I wish I can just be happy and not think my life is now shortened because all thats happened.
Posts.Title: One year later

Posts.Content: Has anyone had a cluster of calcifications and it turned out to be breast cancer?
Posts.Title: Calcifications

Posts.Content: I had uterus cancer had a hysterectomy,BC 2.1 mm had lumpectomy now on arimidex and had radiation. My regular doc told me my thyroid is shutting down put me on medicine and I am going for a sos of thyroid. I asked if it was cancer she said its not a typical sign. More to worry about!
Posts.Title: Uterus cancer, BC and thyroid problems

Posts.Content: anyone on here that had stage 1 breast cancer caught very early and just needed radiation? I had a tumor 2.1 mm very tiny lumpectomy and radiation. I also had uterus cancer stage 1 hysterectomy no further treatment. I was told by doctors they are very common cancers and I will be fine. Anyone here have same situation and still is very depressed thinking it will come back. Being on here really does not help you just get more scared!!!
Posts.Title: Stage 1 breast cancer

Posts.Content: In Oct I had a hysterectomy for uterus cancer all caught early so no other treatment was needed. Soon after went for my mammography which I did not go in 7 years (bad on my part). I had two have two biopsies and one turned out to be cancer. It was er+  pr- her2- stage 1. I went to a top breast surgeon here in NJ and she did a lumpectomy on me. It turned out the tumor was so small 2.1MM barely a stage 1. I had clear margins and my nodes was negative. The strange thing was now I am a Triple Negative which I am very confused by. I went to also a top oncologist and he told me with such a tiny tumor all I will need is radiation. He also gave a Arimidex not for this tumor which he says is gone but for any others if I were to get. I also had a BRCA test waiting for results and if positive it may change how we treat it. I cant understand how these two cancers happened at the same time!!!!!
Posts.Title: Double Trouble

Posts.Content: I had a biopsy and it showed that the tumor was 70 percent er positive everything else negative. I had a lumpectomy and the tumor was really small 2.1MM and now TNBC very strange. The doctor says it does not matter because it is so so small all I need is radiation. Also margins clear and and nodes clear and my BRCA test came back negative. Anyone hear of getting mixed reports from labs?
Posts.Title: Biopsy

Posts.Content: Any women out there experience two cancers back to back?
Posts.Title: Uterus cancer than Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Tomorrow is my first mammo after a nodule 2.1MM was found last year. I had a lumpectomy and some radiation clear margins and neg  nodes. I am scared !!! What is the likely hood that we will see cancer again?
Posts.Title: mammogram

Posts.Content: I had very early breast cancer had lumpectomy and radiation and had early stage uterus cancer had hysterectomy no further treatment needed. My question is what now ? How do you deal with life after cancer? Do you worry all day that it's going to return?
Posts.Title: Life after cancer

Posts.Content: I lived in monmouth NJ, do you? I live in Freehold. I own a children's transportation company. I started to go back to work because I can't keep paying drivers. I am on Arimidex and I gained 20 lbs since all this crap. I did go back to the gym. I do feel fine physically but not emotionally. I have three boys. 23. 21. 18 and they are wonderful. I am always thinking about the cancer returning, even though I was told most likely it will not.
Posts.Title: Life after cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you so much! Lots of women on here scare me and tell me it's coming back. I hope one day I can stop thinking about cancer all day long. You made me feel better! Thanks
Posts.Title: Life after cancer

Posts.Content: all was clear!!! Very happy but always on my mind!
Posts.Title: mammogram

Posts.Content: All caught very early all I needed was a hysterectomy and a lumpectomy with radiation. All clear margins and no nodes positive 2.1mm very small tumor. Radiation over in 2 weeks than what? Do I live my life worrying it it will return? I am always depressed even though doctors say I am very lucky all was caught so early. Cancer is always on my mind. Did anyone on here have back to back cancers?
Posts.Title: Uterus cancer now breast cancer

Posts.Content: DID YOU FIND YOUR CANCER WITH CALCIFICATIONS?
Posts.Title: DCIS O stage

Posts.Content: My friend needed a stereo biopsy for a cluster of calcifications. She went for the biopsy and they did a ultrasound which she did not have when she had the mammo. The weird thing is they now saw two lumps and they did not see them with the mammo they were seen with the ultrasound. Why don't we always have both if one shows more than the other?
Posts.Title: ultrasound for breast cancer!

Posts.Content: Thank you! Still so much on my mind. If I have a nose bleed I think its cancer! It just does not stop all the worryng and yet all I hear is that there are so many women out there who have it worse!
Posts.Title: Beyond treatment

Posts.Content: I has uterus cancer caught very early all I needed was hysterectomy. Soon after found out I had breast cancer very tiny 2.1 mm had a lumpectomy and finished my 33 treatments. Now what? I feel moredepressednow I am not being treatment and all I think is it will come back when and where. Doctors feel everything was caught soearly that I should be fine. Don't know how to continue my life always worrying.
Posts.Title: Beyond treatment
